column2: Adidas Unisex Blue & Purple Adigirl Bp Backpack
column20:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Adidas presents this stylish backpack for kids. The bulky carryall is given a modern twist with a compact structure and smart allocation of space to accommodate all essentials. All good things in small packages indeed!

  • Product Details

  • Blue backpack with purple and neon pink accents
column21: has a flap with Adidas branding
column22: graphic prints and a click clasp closure
column23:
and a name tag on the inner face of the flap
A haul loop and two padded and adjustable shoulder straps for carrying ease
One main compartment with a drawstring closure and a sleeve inside
One mesh pocket in the front
Padded back
Warranty: 3 months against manufacturing defects

  • Material & Care

  • 100% polyester
    Wipe with a clean cloth to remove dirt

    Width: 28 cm
